title: Punjab polls: HC asks ECI to take appropriate steps to secure EVMs | assembly-elections$punjab-2017 | Hindustan Times
text:
Punjab polls: HC asks ECI to take appropriate steps to secure EVMs assembly elections Updated: Feb 09, 2017 15:05 IST HT Correspondent Hindustan Times, Chandigarh The direction came on the petition of Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) which had approached high court seeking security measures for EVMs stored in different parts of the state. (HT File Photo) 
The Punjab and Haryana high court on Thursday asked Election Commission of India (ECI) to take appropriate steps to secure EVM machines used for February 4 assembly elections in Punjab. 
The direction came on the petition of Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) which had approached high court seeking security measures for EVMs stored in different parts of the state. 
AAP had demanded that CCTVs should be installed for monitoring,among other measures. 
It was submitted that authorities were dealing with security of EVMs “casually’ and were “failing” in providing proper security. 
It was also alleged that in some constituencies EVMs stored in strong rooms, were not properly secured and candidates are not being allowed to inspect the same. tags
